document_data.mainbody:
ella the Fair-Dealing was a merchant who lived on the Sword Coast North during the late 15 century DR.
During the Siege of Helms Hold, circa the , Kella set up shop at a small camp located just outside of Helms Hold on the outskirts of Watchers Forest. She was accompanied by the ranger Dassar Truebow, the hedge wizard named Nottin, and Meryth Heartwood.
